txt.en: Copper ore can be found in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should collect copper ore.
Collect copper ore in the Wildwood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A storage crate can be found in either Trader's Wharf or Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should place the copper ore in a storage crate.
Place the copper ore in a storage crate
Collected copper ore in the Wildwood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Someone has posted a task to collect copper ore in the Wildwood.
The bulletin notice reads:\n\n'Needed: Copper ore from the Wildwood for craft and trade. You will be rewarded for your efforts.'
